00054     enum BFGS_RC  {
00055       BFGS_TooFewDigits       = -2,
00056       BFGS_WrongSpaceDim      = -1,
00057       BFGS_NoTermination      =  0,
00058       BFGS_SmallGradient      =  1,
00059       BFGS_SmallStep          =  2,
00060       BFGS_LineSearchComplete =  3,
00061       BFGS_IterationLimit     =  4,
00062       BFGS_LargeSteps         =  5,
00063       BFGS_Stopped            =  6
00064     };
00065 
00066     typedef void BFGSMinFunc ( void * UserData, int N, rvector X,
00067                                realtype & F );
00068     typedef BFGSMinFunc * PBFGSMinFunc;
00069 
00070     typedef void BFGSPrintFunc ( void * UserData, int N, int Itn,
00071                                  rvector X, rvector G, realtype F );
00072     typedef BFGSPrintFunc * PBFGSPrintFunc;
00073 
00074     DefineClass(BFGSMin);
00075 
00076     class BFGSMin  {
00077 
00078       public :
00079 
00080         BFGSMin ();
00081         virtual ~BFGSMin();
00082 
00083         virtual void  MinFunc  ( rvector X, realtype & F );
00084         virtual void  Print    ( int Itn, rvector X, rvector G,
00085                                  realtype F );
00086 
00087         void  SetMinFunction   ( void * UserData, PBFGSMinFunc   Fnc );
00088         void  SetPrintFunction ( void * UserData, PBFGSPrintFunc Fnc );
00089 
00090 
00091         // ======================================================
00092         //
00093         //    .--------------------------------------------.
00094         //    |                                            |
00095         //    |     UNCONSTRAINED MINIMIZATION DRIVER      |
00096         //    |                                            |
00097         //    `--------------------------------------------'
00098         //
00099         //    Finds a minimum of function F(X), X is vector [1..N],
00100         //  defined by virtual MinFunc. Virtual Print provides
00101         //  information on every iteration step.
00102         //
00103         //
00104         //               Input  parameters  :
00105         //             -----------------------
00106         //
00107         //    N        is the dimension the minimization space
00108         //
00109         //    x0       [1..N] is the initial point for minimization
00110         //
00111         //    TypX     [1..N] is the array of the typical ranges of
00112         //          X - components,  which are used for the scaling.
00113         //          If  TypX<=0.0  then  1.0  will be substituted
00114         //
00115         //    Digits   is the number of valid decimal digits in
00116         //          the calculated value of minimizing function ( F ).
00117         //          If  Digits<=0  then the Driver will consider
00118         //          that the  F  is computed with usual machine's
00119         //          noise
00120         //
00121         //    ItnLmt   is the maximum available number of iterations.
00122         //          If  ItnLmt=0  then  100  will be substituted
00123         //
00124         //    TypF     is the expected absolute value of  F  in the
00125         //          minimum,  which is used in the stop criterion.
00126         //          If  TypF<=0.0  then  1.0  will be substituted
00127         //
00128         //    GrdTol   is the desired absolute value of the gradient
00129         //          vector in the minimum of  F .  If  GrdTol<=0.0
00130         //          then the some value correlated with machine's
00131         //          noise will be substituted
00132         //
00133         //    StpTol   is the minimum available step for the minimi-
00134         //          zation.  The execution stops if the distance
00135         //          between two consequential approximation will be
00136         //          less then  StpTol .  If  StpTol<=0.0  then the
00137         //          some value correlated with machine's  noise
00138         //          will be substituted
00139         //
00140         //    MaxStp   is the maximum available step for then minimi-
00141         //          zation.  This parameter only prevents the appea-
00142         //          rance of the too large steps,  but the execution
00143         //          stops if more than  5  steps with length of MaxStep
00144         //          will consequently appear.
00145         //
00146         //
00147         //
00148         //               Outpute  parameters  :
00149         //             --------------------------
00150         //
00151         //    x0        will be the point at which the minimisation
00152         //          had stopped
00153         //
00154         //    Func      will be the function's value at  x0
00155         //
00156         //    TermCode  will be the reason of stopping :
00157         //
00158         //         1 <=>  the norm of gradient vector at  x0  is
00159         //               less than  GrdTol ;  the  x0  is probable
00160         //               point of the minimum
00161         //         2 <=>  the distance between two last approxima-
00162         //               tions was less than  StpTol ;  the  x0
00163         //               may be the point of minimum
00164         //         3 <=>  the gradient length is greater than
00165         //               GrdTol ,  but future minimization fails ;
00166         //               it may be the consequence of the errors
00167         //               at the computing of gradient, but also
00168         //               x0 could be the point of minimum
00169         //         4 <=>  the iteration limit had been exchausted
00170         //         5 <=>  more than  5  steps with length of
00171         //               MaxStp  had been made
00172         //         6 <=>  the termination key ( Esc or End )
00173         //               had been pressed.
00174         //
00175         //
00176         // ========================================================
00177 
00178         void  BFGS_Driver      ( int        MinN,
00179                                  rvector    x0,
00180                                  rvector    TypX,
00181                                  realtype & FuncValue,
00182                                  int      & TerminationCode,
00183                                  int        Digits   = 0,
00184                                  int        ItnLmt   = 0,
00185                                  realtype   TypF     = 0.0,
00186                                  realtype   GrdTol   = 0.0,
00187                                  realtype   StpTol   = 0.0,
00188                                  realtype   MaxStp   = MaxReal,
00189                                  bool       Hess     = false,
00190                                  rvector    LowLimit = NULL,
00191                                  rvector    TopLimit = NULL );
00192 
00193         void  Stop();  // generates stop signal to stop optimization
00194 
00195 
00196       protected :
00197 
00198         PBFGSMinFunc    MFunc;
00199         void *          MFuncData;
00200         PBFGSPrintFunc  PFunc;
00201         void *          PFuncData;
00202 
00203         int             N,NAlloc;
00204         rmatrix         Hsn;
00205         rvector         TL,LL,XOpt,XPlus,Sx,SN,HDiag,GradX,GPlus;
00206         rvector         StepSize,FNeighbor;
00207         rvector         us,uy,ut;
00208         bvector         Freese;
00209         realtype        Func,FPlus,FOpt;
00210         realtype        TakenLambda;
00211         bool            ForDiff;  // if True then forward differences are
00212                                   // used for the 1st estimation of the
00213                                   // Hessian (which is less expensive),
00214                                   // otherwise central differences will
00215                                   // be employed (which is more expensive).
00216         bool            CalcHess;
00217 
00218         realtype        Etha,SqrtEtha,CubertEtha,TpF,GrdEps,StpEps,MxStep;
00219         realtype        SqrtEps;
00220         int             CnsMax,MaxItn,TermCode;
00221         bool            ModF;
00222 
00223         void  MinFunc1      ( rvector X, realtype & F );
00224         void  UMInCk        ( rvector  x0,     rvector  TypX,
00225                               int      Digits, realtype TypF,
00226                               realtype GrdTol, realtype StpTol,
00227                               realtype MaxStp, int      ItnLmt );
00228         void  UMStop0       ( rvector x0, rvector Grad );
00229         void  UMStop        ( rvector x0, rvector Grad, int RetCode,
00230                               int ItnCnt, bool MaxTkn );
00231 
00232         virtual void Gradient ( rvector X, rvector G, realtype Fc );
00233         virtual void FDHessF  ( realtype Fc, rvector X );
00234 
00235         void  FDGrad        ( rvector X, rvector G, realtype Fc );
00236         void  CDGrad        ( rvector X, rvector G );
00237         void  MdHess        ( rmatrix H, rvector HDg );
00238         void  InitHessUnFac ( realtype F,  rmatrix H );
00239         void  BFGSUnFac     ( rvector  Xc,      rvector Xp,
00240                               rvector  Gc,      rvector Gp,
00241                               bool     AnalGrad, rvector HDg,
00242                               rmatrix  H );
00243         void  Choose_Lambda ( rvector X, rvector S, realtype & Lambda0 );
00244         void  LineSearch    ( rvector    px0,       rvector   G,
00245                               rvector    P,         realtype pFunc,
00246                               int     & RetCode,    bool & MaxTkn );
00247         void  GetMemory     ();
00248         void  FreeMemory    ();
00249         void  Relax         ();
00250         void  CopyPlus      ( rvector x0 );
00251 
00252     };
00253 
00254   }
00255 
00256 }
